title: [K-12] Computational Thinking Integration Instructional Design Workshop for Social Studies Education

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic social studies curriculum content and general computer application skills
context.additional_context: Enhancing practical lesson design competencies for pre-service teachers integrating computational thinking into social studies education

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more computational thinking strategies suitable for social studies data analysis scenarios
Learners can complete at least one social studies instructional design applying the data-pattern-rule model
Learners can demonstrate step-by-step the learner-centered task design process in a mobile environment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
